title: S2 Ep39: Improving the welfare of migrant workers
itunes:title: Improving the welfare of migrant workers
description: Millions of Sri Lankans have migrated to the Gulf region to work, but almost one in 10 makes a formal complaint to the consulate about abuse or employer malpractice. Is there a better way to protect them? Nilesh Fernando tells Tim Phillips about a successful policy to regulate the agencies that match workers and employers.
itunes:author: VoxDev.org
dc:creator: VoxDev.org
